p.d: Writer, journalist, publisher and radio personality, Roger Grenier, who died on 8 November 2017, shared his memories with Florence Mauro. An opportunity to open a page of French literary and political history dating back to the 1930s, and remember some of Grenier's close friends, Albert Camus, Pascal Pia, Claude Roy... Directed by: Florence Mauro (France, 2018)
